entries.meaning: Anything added to something in order to stiffen it, such as a support beam, or starch for a collar.
examples: […]  he wears a wisp of black silk round his neck, without any stiffener, as an apology for a neckerchief  […]

entries.meaning: (slang) An alcoholic drink taken to fortify oneself.
examples: I believe the old man has taken himself off to the nearest bar for a stiffener.
